metadata.name: Powershell Inline Execution From A File
metadata.comment: Detects inline execution of PowerShell code from a file

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('iex ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('invoke-expression ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('invoke-command ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('icm '))) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('cat ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('get-content ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('type '))) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -raw')))

output.summary: Detects inline execution of PowerShell code from a file
